code: import{connect}from"react-redux";import Users from"./Users";import{followAC,setUsersAC,unfollowAC}from"../../redux/usersReducer";var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{users:state.usersPage.users};};var mapDispatchToProps=function mapDispatchToProps(dispatch){return{follow:function follow(userId){return dispatch(followAC(userId));},unfollow:function unfollow(userId){return dispatch(unfollowAC(userId));},setUsers:function setUsers(users){return dispatch(setUsersAC(users));}};};export default connect(mapStateToProps,mapDispatchToProps)(Users);
